photo.description: Green Home is a free template designed by light green color header graphics based on white color background.
Pink Round is a free template with beautiful round corners using red little gradient background.
Magic Color is a light template using colorful blue, green, white background. Main menu is stylish using orange candy bar.
Black Wall is a free website template using black wooden strips as background image.
Grand Mini Theme is decorated with beautiful menu icons. This is one long page layout for all pages based on dark blue background.
Purple Ray home page is divided into 4 columns and it is integrated with Nivo slider.
Green Jelly homepage is beautifully integrated with jQuery Nivo Slider. Content area contains 2-column and 4-column structures.
Newspaper theme is based on black, white, and red colors. Main menu includes drop down sub-menus.
Accordion Theme is a free website layout for any purpose. Homepage features jQuery accordion slider.
Dark Pro homepage features an image slider using Lof JSliderNews and 4-column content sections.
